title: New York New York Disco, New York City
marks:
Signature; Title; Edition

in pencil, on back: [ in pencil, on back: [Toby Old 1978]
description: clockwise from UL:  standing man in a clown costume; seated man wearing pointed hat and striped shirt with glitter on his face; standing woman wearing sequined topless bustier and sequined stockings; frizzy-haired woman with face painted white, wearing a bra with glitter on her chest; smiling woman in hat with closed eyes and PL hand on previous woman\'s PL breast, wearing a bib with false sequined breasts, printed \'PRIVATE PARTS\'; heavily-made-up figure wearing fishnet stockings and fur-trimmed coat
creditline: Gift of Michael K. Hsu and Anonymous Gift, by exchange
